sig_info: Fisk brings his ill intent upon the Contest, entering the fight with 2 to 4 Rages active (rounded down).
When Kingpin’s Overpower Buff ends, he has a chance to gain up to 5 Rages, with each having a 25 to 85.01% chance to activate.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Base Regeneration Rate is set at 50% instead of the normal 100%.
FIGHT START: Immune to all effects that modify Regeneration Rate, except Poison.
RAGE: Kingpin can gain Rage, which is a Debuff with no inherent effect.
Kingpin gains a non-Rage Debuff: 60% chance to Purify it and gain 1 Rage. Cooldown: 0.5 seconds.
Kingpin takes damage: Gain 1 Rage. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
Enemy Evades or Auto-Blocks: Gain 1 Rage. Cooldown: 1.50 seconds.
INCOMING DEBUFFS: Each Debuff on Kingpin only strengthens his resolve, increasing Attack Rating by 26.1 and Combat Power Rate by 5%.
OVERPOWER - WHEN KINGPIN HAS 8+ DEBUFFS: Kingpin Purifies 8 Debuffs to grant a 100% chance to gain an Overpower Buff, lasting 15 seconds and providing +217.5 Attack Rating as well as Unblockable Special Attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: While charging a Heavy Attack, Kingpin gains +2400 Physical Resistance and gains an Unstoppable Buff for 0.8 seconds.

If Kingpin lands 3 Heavy Attacks within 4 seconds of each other he has a 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff granting +73.95 Attack Rating for 14 seconds. While this Fury Buff is active, Kingpin cannot gain his Unstoppable Buff while charging his Heavy Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: A blast of black ISO-8 has a 100% chance to inflict a Degeneration Debuff, causing 130.5 direct damage over 14 seconds.
While this Degeneration is active, the opponent suffers -50% Attack Rating and -65% Defensive Ability Accuracy.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to gain an Unstoppable Buff lasting 7.50 seconds.
While this Unstoppable is active, each hit either Champion lands has a 50% chance to grant Kingpin 1 Rage. No Cooldown.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain 4 Rage & Refresh all Overpower Buffs.
100% chance to inflict a 3.50 second Stun Debuff.

Kingpin takes damage: Gain 1 Rage. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
Enemy Evades or Auto-Blocks: Gain 1 Rage. Cooldown: 1.50 seconds.
INCOMING DEBUFFS: Each Debuff on Kingpin only strengthens his resolve, increasing Attack Rating by 398.1 and Combat Power Rate by 5%.
OVERPOWER - WHEN KINGPIN HAS 8+ DEBUFFS: Kingpin Purifies 8 Debuffs to grant a 100% chance to gain an Overpower Buff, lasting 15 seconds and providing +3317.5 Attack Rating as well as Unblockable Special Attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: While charging a Heavy Attack, Kingpin gains +3000 Physical Resistance and gains an Unstoppable Buff for 0.8 seconds.

If Kingpin lands 3 Heavy Attacks within 4 seconds of each other he has a 100% chance to gain a Fury Buff granting +1127.95 Attack Rating for 14 seconds. While this Fury Buff is active, Kingpin cannot gain his Unstoppable Buff while charging his Heavy Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: A blast of black ISO-8 has a 100% chance to inflict a Degeneration Debuff, causing 1990.5 direct damage over 14 seconds.
While this Degeneration is active, the opponent suffers -50% Attack Rating and -65% Defensive Ability Accuracy.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to gain an Unstoppable Buff lasting 7.50 seconds.
While this Unstoppable is active, each hit either Champion lands has a 50% chance to grant Kingpin 1 Rage. No Cooldown.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain 4 Rage & Refresh all Overpower Buffs.
100% chance to inflict a 3.50 second Stun Debuff.

sig_info: Fisk brings his ill intent upon the Contest, entering the fight with 2 to 4 Rages active (rounded down).
When Kingpin’s Overpower Buff ends, he has a chance to gain up to 5 Rages, with each having a 30 to 90% chance to activate.
